info.name: ALKEMY CHALLENGE BACKEND - NodeJs
info.description:
#### ALKEMY CHALLENGE BACKEND - NodeJs

# **Disney Api**

###### Node-Express-Sequelize-MySql-Jwt

The system consist of three entities: **Genre**, **Movie**, **Character**.

**Many to Many** relation on:

*   Genre <-> Movie
*   Character <-> Movie
    

Enabled endpoints for **CRUD** methods for **Character** and **Movie** entities. And enabled endpoints (**signup** and **login**) to create and authenticate users.

All the methods that modify data are private and require **Authentication Bearer** header.

item.name: Movies

query.description: String - Filter movies with title that includes this value.
Number (Id) - Filters the movies associated with the genre identified with this value.
String - Order the results by creation date (by default it sort ascendig, so only need to specifies for descending).

request.description: Get all movies data, fields: id, image, title, creation. You can filter by title, genre, or sort by creation date.

query.description: String - Filter movies with title that includes this value.
Number (Id) - Filters the movies associated with the genre identified with this value.
String - Order the results by creation date (by default it sort ascendig, so only need to specifies for descending).

request.description: Get all fields of a movie by id, included the associated Genres and Characters.

formdata.description: File [jpg|jpeg|png|svg|webp, max: 2mb] - Movie image file.
String* [min:2, max:125, unique] - Title of the new movie.
String* [format: yyyy-mm-dd] - Date only string, representing the fate of release of the new movie.
Float [min:0, max:5, def:0]- Score value of the new movie.
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of characters id's starring the movie (Should exists previously).
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of genres id's to be associated with the movie (Should exists previously).

request.description: Create a movie, validating the data sended. You can pass an array of Characters/Genres ids, to create the association with an existing data row.

formdata.description: File [jpg|jpeg|png|svg|webp, max: 2mb] - Movie image file.
String* [min:2, max:125, unique] - Title of the new movie.
String* [format: yyyy-mm-dd] - Date only string, representing the fate of release of the new movie.
Float [min:0, max:5, def:0]- Score value of the new movie.
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of characters id's starring the movie (Should exists previously).
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of genres id's to be associated with the movie (Should exists previously).

response.name: 400 - Genre does not exists

*   Score

item.name: Characters

query.description: String - Filter characters with name that includes this value.
Number - Filter characters with age equals this value.
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of movies id's, filter characters that have starred in at least one of the movies.

request.description: Get all characters data, fields: id, image, name. You can filter by name, age, or movie.

query.description: String - Filter characters with name that includes this value.
Number - Filter characters with age equals this value.
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of movies id's, filter characters that have starred in at least one of the movies.

request.description: Get all fields of a character by id, included the associated Movies.

formdata.description: File [jpg|jpeg|png|svg|webp, max: 2mb] - Character image file.
String* [min:2, max:125, unique] - Name of the character.
Number [min:0] - Age of the character in years.
Float [min:0] - Weight of the character in Kg.
String [max:225] - A description, or background of the character.
Array<Number(Id)> - Array of movies id's in which the character stars (Should exists previously).

request.description: Create a character, validating the data sended. You can pass an array of Movies ids, to create the association with an existing data row.

item.name: Users

urlencoded.description: String - Valid email to register new user.
String [min:6] - Password to register new user.

request.description: Register a new user by passing valid emai, pass, and repeated pass.

urlencoded.description: String - Valid email to register new user.
String [min:6] - Password to register new user.
String - Valid email to register new user.
String [min:6] - Password to register new user.
String - Valid email of user to check on db.
String [min:6] - User password to match on db.

request.description: Log in an user, by passing existing email, and matching pass.

urlencoded.description: String - Valid email of user to check on db.
String [min:6] - User password to match on db.
